Name: ZAP Master
About the game: ZAP Master is a 2D, abstract art, base defense/bullet hell game where players click to zap incoming enemies. Enemies spawn in and travel down radial lanes, and if one reaches the end of the lane, it's game over! The game also allows you to record your scores, so challenge yourself with players from all over the world and see who has the best reflexes!
